original_text: So Moses gave command, and word was proclaimed throughout the camp, “Let no man or woman do anything more for the contribution for the sanctuary.” So the people were restrained from bringing,
korean_text: 모세가 명령을 내리매 그들이 진중에 공포하여 이르되 남녀를 막론하고 성소에 드릴 예물을 다시 만들지 말라 하매 백성이 가져오기를 그치니

sentences.original_text: and word was proclaimed throughout the camp
“Let no man or woman do anything more
sentences.korean_translation: “남자나 여자는 더 이상 아무것도 하지 말라”

sentences.original_text: for the contribution for the sanctuary.”
So the people were restrained from bringing
